Calculating your safety

    Protection Advised

    How do i SHIELD myself from polluted AIR



  • Close the windows

  • Check AirShield before leaving

  • Use HEPA filter air purifiers indoors

  • Try and go to a non polluted zone when outside

  • When having physical activity, limit exposure to polluted air zone

  • Use N95 masks, those filter >95% or 99% of inhaled particles at 0.3 μm in size


    • View USER GUIDE for scientific studies

    No protection needed

    How do i SHIELD myself from polluted AIR



  • Check AirShield before leaving

  • You are free to open the windows

  • Use HEPA filter air purifiers indoors

  • Isolate seams and cracks in your house

  • When having physical activity,
    stay within clean air zone


    • View USER GUIDE for scientific studies
